text: Constance Mary Towers (born May 20, 1933) is an American actress and singer. Towers made her movie debut in the Technicolor picture Bring Your Smile Along (1955). She would later be known for her roles in John Ford's westerns The Horse Soldiers (1959) and Sergeant Rutledge (1960). She would later appear in Samuel Fuller's thrillers Shock Corridor (1963) and The Naked Kiss (1964). ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Interview, May 17, 2017; accessed May 18, 2017. title: Constance Towers
